title: the Ocean Marshal
intro: Nakaraj is the divine protector of the Bastion of the Tide Callers, a vast underwater stronghold. He is a noble but terrifying titan who embodies the wrath and grace of the tides. Adorned in gold-trimmed ceremonial armor and scales that shimmer like emeralds, Varuna rises from the deep to wash away those who threaten the sanctity of his waters.

abilities.name: Crushing Weight
abilities.details:
Whenever Nakaraj damages an enemy hero, he applies stacks of Pressure (visible as a secondary bar under their health) (basic attack adds 1 stack).

At 10 stacks, the enemy's defense is shattered, causing them to lose a percentage of physical resistance, magical resistance and movement speed for a duration.

Once the target recovers from the defense break, they cannot gain Pressure stacks again for a short duration.

abilities.name: Geyser Burst
abilities.details:
Nakaraj slams his fist into the ground, calling forth a high-pressure blast of water at a target location after a brief delay, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and applying 2 stacks of Pressure on them.

Enemies in the centre of the blast are knocked up, take more damage and receive 1 additional stack of Pressure.

If cast upon a Tidal Pool (from Undercurrent), the geyser becomes supercharged,knocking up all enemies within the entire radius of the pool, not just the centre (also apply 1 additional stack of Pressure to all enemies as well).

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.details:
Nakaraj creates a rhythmic aura of water around himself for a few seconds. Every second, the aura pulses, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to nearby enemies and applying a stack of Pressure.

For every enemy hit by a pulse, Nakaraj heals for a small amount (increased against heroes).

abilities.name: Undercurrent
abilities.details:
Nakaraj sends a surge of water deep underground toward an enemy target. Upon reaching the target, the water erupts, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to the target and slowing all nearby enemies for a short duration.

The eruption leaves behind a Tidal Pool on the ground for short duration.

abilities.name: Abyssal Wrath
abilities.details:
Nakaraj summons a colossal wave and rides it forward in a wide path.

Nakaraj is unstoppable during the charge. All enemies hit are knocked back along the wave and dealt magical damage (scaling with magical power).

If the enemies are standing on top of a Tidal Pool (from Undercurrent), they will be knocked up instead of back.

All enemies hit by the wave instantly receive 5 stacks of Pressure.
